#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int N;
	scanf("%d",&N);
	getchar();//to remove the extra newline
	map<string,int> participants;//taking it maximum	
	queue<string> myqueue;
	for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		string name;
		cin>>name;
		myqueue.push(name);
	}
	int level=1;
	while(!myqueue.empty())
	{
		string name=myqueue.front();
		if(level==1)
		{
			cout<<level<<" "<<name<<endl;
			participants.insert(make_pair(name,1));
			level++;
		}
		else
		{
			if(participants.find(name)!=participants.end())
			{
				if(participants[name]==level-1)
				{
					cout<<level<<" "<<name<<endl;
					participants[name]+=1;
					level++;
				}
				else
				{
					participants[name]+=1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				participants.insert(make_pair(name,1));
			}
		}
		myqueue.pop();
	}	
	return 0;
}
